text: "The Edge of Heaven" is a 1986 song by English pop duo Wham!. It was taken from their albums The Final and Music from the Edge of Heaven. It went to number 1 in Belgium, Greece, Ireland, the Netherlands and the United Kingdom, number 2 in Australia, Iceland, Italy and Norway, number 3 in Finland and New Zealand, number 4 in Germany and Switzerland and number 10 in Canada, Sweden and the United States. == Track listing == Category:1986 songs Category:Wham! songs
title: The Edge of Heaven
